import React from 'react' type Props = {} const PrivacyPolicy = (props: Props) => { return (

PRIVACY POLICY

At NatsKicks, we value your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal information. This Privacy Policy outlines how we collect, use, and safeguard the data you provide when using our website.

Information We Collect
When you visit our website, we may collect certain personally identifiable information, including but not limited to your name, address, email address, phone number, and payment details. This information is necessary for processing orders, providing customer support, and enhancing your shopping experience.

Use of Your Information
We use the information collected to process and fulfill your orders, communicate important updates, and respond to your inquiries. Additionally, we may use your email address to provide you with promotional offers, exclusive discounts, and updates about new arrivals, only if you have consented to receive such communications.

Protecting Your Information
We employ industry-standard security measures to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, disclosure, alteration, or destruction. Our secure server encrypts all data you provide during the checkout process, ensuring that it remains confidential and secure.

Third-Party Disclosure
We do not sell or rent your personally identifiable information to any third parties for marketing purposes. However, we may share your data with trusted third-party service providers who assist us in operating our website, conducting business activities, or serving you better. These providers have agreed to keep your information confidential and use it solely for the purposes specified by us.

Cookies and Similar Technologies
Like many websites, we use cookies and similar technologies to enhance your browsing experience. These small files contain data that allows our website to remember certain information, such as your preferences and shopping cart contents. You have the option to disable cookies in your browser settings, but please note that doing so may limit certain functionalities of our website.

Children's Privacy
Our website is not intended for individuals under the age of 13. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children. If you believe that your child has provided us with their personal information, please contact us immediately, and we will take necessary steps to delete such information from our records.

Changes to the Privacy Policy
We reserve the right to modify or update this Privacy Policy at any time. We encourage you to review this policy periodically for any changes. By continuing to use our website, you acknowledge and agree to be bound by the updated Privacy Policy.

Contact Us
If you have any questions, concerns, or requests regarding our Privacy Policy, please feel free to contact us. Our dedicated team is here to assist you and provide the information you need. Protecting your privacy is of utmost importance to us, and we appreciate your trust in choosing NatsKicks.

) } export default PrivacyPolicy
